projects.title: Music Player

projects.description: This is my First Application and worked on it for more than three weeks. This project is my eye opening project which lead me to the curiosity of exploring and learning more.

projects.title: Chat App
projects.subtitle: DevChat
projects.description: This application taught me about all the different Internet jargons and also while doing this project, I had to be patient and learn new concept of Socket Programming.

projects.title: QR Code App
projects.subtitle: DevQR
projects.description: This application allows users to scan and read QR codes. The app uses the device's camera to scan the code and then decodes the information it contains, which can include links to websites, text, or other data. The app also has additional features, such as the ability to create and generate QR codes.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.subtitle: Climate Checker
projects.description: This application fetches the weather from the api shows the weather in the given city

projects.title: QR Based Attendance System
projects.subtitle: An Inspiration
projects.description: Malaysian University uses the QR Code based attendance system which inspired me to build the system and since I had the previous experience in building the DevQrCode app, I did the application comfortably and finished the full fledged prototype.

projects.title: Automation Scripts
projects.subtitle: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python Inspiration
projects.description:
After reading the book, I decided to automate some of the processes I do regulary and automated that such as:
organizer.py - Messy Downloads Folder Organization
tweeter.py - Tweets stuff
dailywally.py - Integrates with Google Calendar and Maintains Local Version
journal.py - Integrates with Tumblr and maintains my Journal
inspire.py - Gives a daily quote for me

projects.title: Quotes API
projects.subtitle: Orchestrated API
projects.description: This API is built to learn about API Building using FastAPI and also different technologies like Docker and Docker Compose. This API can CRUD Quotes and has different variations.

projects.title: TxTThuG
projects.subtitle: An Home writing software
projects.description: COVID-19 made us lazy and so I took the matter into my hands and this application converts the text to image where the image has the handwritten text and made us more lazier.

projects.title: ChocolateNFT Generator
projects.subtitle: An Web3 Hype Art Generator
projects.description: I took a part in NFT Hype in 2022 where I built a machine produces different NFTs using candies which is inexpensive solution to create art

projects.title: Searchitup (Not another Google)
projects.subtitle: Why go to the site to search
projects.description: This project is more of a fun way to show the understanding the working of web apps. Sometimes we have to wait for the app to load and there we have fill the search form to query the application but this is a quicker solution where enter the query and search in any platform.

projects.title: ABScraper
projects.subtitle: Scrapes books for me
projects.description: There is a site which has all the audio books and I needed all the books but I was tired of traversing the sites and so I built this scraper which identifies all the mp3 files and creates a seperate folder for the books and downloads all the files into the folder. This saved me a lot of time.
